title: Tool steel manufacture
brief_description: Filmed at the works of Adcar Allen and Co Ltd, Sheffield. Shows the making of genuine double shear steel - the oldest Sheffield process. Includes pattern making (moulding by hand and machine); machining steel castings; tramway and railway trackwork.
